t: Future Shop - Wikipedia
s: September 24, 2024 - Future Shop was a Canadian electronics store chain. It was established in 1982 by Hassan Khosrowshahi. By 1990, the chain had become the country's largest retailer of computer and consumer electronics. In October 2012, the company operated 149 locations across Canada.

t: Future Shop latest Canadian retail casualty to succumb to 'Amazon effect' | Financial Post
s: March 30, 2015 - Share this Story : Future Shop latest Canadian retail casualty to succumb to 'Amazon effect' ... Future Shop has joined a growing list of failed electronics retail brands, with the sector becoming increasingly competitive as consumers comparison shop with discount and online retailers

t: Best Buy Canada consolidates Future Shop under Best Buy brand, ...
s: July 15, 2020 - Future Shop locations across Canada were closed Saturday as parent company Best Buy consolidated its operations in a move that will result in 1,500 job losses country-wide.
